newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-Telebras still a Salomon buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Telebras still a Salomon buy.

text.p: -- Salomon Brothers said in a report it was maintaining its buy rating on Brazilian state-owned telecommunications firm Telebras.
-- It also said it was maintaining its earnings per share estimates of $10.84 for fiscal 1997.
-- Salomon Brothers said Telebras reported a net consolidated profit of 691 million reais in the first quarter, versus its forecast of 775 million reais.
-- It said Telebras' first quarter earnings would have been higher if they had excluded a 103 million real non-recurring loss regarding the closure of a telex plant.
-- Telebras preferred was up 0.77 percent at 131 reais earlier on the Sao Paulo bourse.
-- Its ADR was up 1-3/4 points in New York at 123.
